[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Struct: IncentivePool] [Table Growth] Lines 59-61 have three tables per pool that grow with users; could unbounded growth cause storage exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Struct: IncentivePool] [Index Paid Tracking] index_rewards_paids at line 59 stores u256 per user; could large number of users cause table operations to become prohibitively expensive? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Struct: Incentive] [Pool Vector Growth] pool_objs at line 39 grows unboundedly; if 10,000 pools created, could iteration in update_reward become DOS vector? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Struct: Incentive] [Inactive Vector] inactive_objs at line 40 never shrinks; could repeated freeze operations accumulate thousands of inactive pool addresses? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Struct: Incentive] [Double Table] Both pools and funds are tables; could key collision occur if pool address equals funds address? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_one()] [Ray Math Precision] Rewards stored in RAY (1e27) but converted to u64 in claim; could cumulative rounding errors steal small amounts from users over time? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_release_rate()] [Rate Calculation] Ray_div of total_supply by duration; if duration is very long (years), could rate become too small and round to zero? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_user_effective_amount()] [Balance Precision] User balances are u256 but may represent different decimals; could decimal mismatch cause incorrect effective amount calculation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Ray to U64 Conversion] Line 322 divides by ray() to convert u256 to u64; could this truncate large rewards and make them unclaimable? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Concurrent Claims] If two users claim simultaneously from same pool, could both read same distributed value at line 324 and exceed total_supply? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: update_reward()] [Concurrent Updates] If update_reward called twice for same user before commit, could index_rewards_paids be updated twice with same value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: freeze_incentive_pool()] [Concurrent Freeze] If freeze_incentive_pool called while users are claiming, could pool_objs change mid-claim causing panic? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: withdraw_funds()] [Balance Race] If withdraw_funds and add_funds called concurrently, could balance become inconsistent between balance::value check and balance::split? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: create_incentive_pool()] [Max U64 Total Supply] If total_supply set to u64::MAX at line 211, could distributed overflow at line 329 after even single claim? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: create_incentive_pool()] [Zero Total Supply] If total_supply=0, pool can never distribute rewards; should this be prevented at creation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_one()] [Instant Pool] If start_at=end_at-1 (1ms duration), could all rewards be distributed in single block, causing gas spike? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: calculate_user_effective_amount()] [Max Factor] If factor=u256::MAX, line 477 ray_mul could overflow; is there upper limit validation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [All Pools Closed] If all matching pools have now > closed_at, loop exits with amount_to_pay=0; does user lose unclaimed rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: freeze_incentive_pool()] [Freeze All] If deadline > max_phase, all pools frozen; could this permanently disable reward system? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: create_funds_pool()] [Generic Type T] No validation that T is valid coin type; could attacker create pool with malicious type that breaks balance operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: add_funds()] [Coin Split] Line 157 uses utils::split_coin_to_balance which might have its own vulnerabilities; is split amount validated? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: decrease_balance()] [Private Function] Lines 634-637 split balance without validation; could internal calls pass invalid amount? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: update_reward()] [Loop DOS] Lines 392-415 loop through all pools for asset+option; if attacker creates 1000 pools with same parameters, could update_reward become too expensive? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Multi-Pool Claim] Lines 303-338 loop through all matching pools; could attacker force claim from 100+ pools to DOS transaction? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v2.move] [Function: freeze_incentive_pool()] [Vector Rebuild] Lines 256-266 iterate and rebuild vectors; for 10,000 pools, could this exceed gas limit? (Medium)
